text: Saleh Ali al-Sammad (; 1 January 1979 â€“ 19 April 2018) was a Yemeni political figure from the Houthi movement. He served as the president of Yemen's Supreme Political Council until his death. On April 23, 2018, Houthi officials announced al-Sammad was killed in a Saudi-led coalition drone airstrike. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths by airstrike Category:Yemeni politicians
title: Saleh Ali al-Sammad
